label: 守護
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: In Kamakura times, a province-level constable" appointed by the Bakufu. Acted as liaison officer between the Bakufu and its provincial vassals, and held primary responsibility for the suppression of local rebellion and major crime. See taibon sankajō. In Muromachi times shugo came to mean a provincial military governor appointed by the Ashikaga Bakufu.　[大犯三箇条（たいぼんさんかじょう）]　［Cf. Mass, 1982.］　"
